page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: PEOPLE IN CHEDZOY FOLLOW MANY TYPES OF EMPLOYMENT.MANY WORK IN THE BRITISH CELLOPHANE FACTORY NEARBY.A TYPICAL JOB IS THAT OF A COATING OPERATOR.WOOD PULP IS USED IN THE PRODUCTION OF BONDED FIBRE,TOGETHER WITH CS2 AND OTHER DANGEROUS GASES.GAS-MASKS ARE NOT WORN BY OPERATORS,BUT OTHER PROTECTIVE CLOTHING IS.THE TALL CHIMNEY EMITS SMOKE AND FUMES,WHICH BLOW ACROSS CHEDZOY AND THE COUNTRYSIDE.SOME OTHER MEN WORK AT HINKLEY POINT NUCLEAR POWER STATION, NEAR STOLFORD.THEY WORK ON A SHIFT SYSTEM,LIKE THE MEN AT CELLOPHANE.A MECHANICAL MAINTENANCE FOREMAN,WORKS 37 HOURS A WEEK,PLUS OVERTIME.THIS INCLUDES SOME OFFICE WORK.THERE ARE ABOUT 100 FOREMEN.THE SHIFTS ARE 61/2 AND 71/2 HOURS LONG.SEVERAL POLICEMEN LIVE IN CHEDZOY,BUT OUR VILLAGE "BOBBY LIVES IN WESTONZOYLAND.
